********* Anix Host *********​

The Ultimate Hosting Solution​


If you are tired looking and searching for reliable hosting provider with proved support and uptime guarantee for all your needs and requirements, then look no further. All of the web hosting packages come with rich back-ended control panels and features for administering your web site and make your life easier.

Every web hosting plan comes with a satisfaction guarantee, 99.99% Up-time guarantee and 24/7/365 Support. All of our plans are fully packed with the latest upgrades for maximum performance and security!

To check more promotions and coupon codes keep yourself update and subscribe to our promotion page: http://anixhost.com/promotions.html
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[ Dedication to our customers ]
We value every one of our customers, without customers we wouldn't have a successful business like we do today, which is why we provide our full dedication and focus towards our customers, to ensure that they are taken care of and are given the best service possible.

[ We will move you ]
No problem! We will take care of everything necessary to transfer you to our servers free of charge. Just sit back and relax as we take care of all of the work for you. NO downtime at all for your site! Even get free security checks!

[ Server Setup/Info ]
Our shared hosting servers are equipment with cPanel/WHM and tweaked for perfomance, stability and security. Our powerful hardware and well configured systems make sure your sites are always available, fast and secure. Did you know 67% servers are not properly configured/secured and are vulnerable to all kinds of attacks? Are you hosted on such a terrible server? We take security very seriously and you will be safe from common RFI/LFI/XSS/SQL injection attacks against your PHP/MySQL applications as well as from server side attacks on our servers.

[ ZERO Overselling ]
It has become a general trend in the industry for hosting companies to offer unfeasible amounts of storage and transfer in hopes of gaining customers on that notion alone. However, at SolidShellSecurity, we promise to never allocate more resources than we have available! If we have 100GB available on a given server, our guarantee is to never lease more than 50 accounts with 2GB allocated each. At other hosts you may find yourself sharing that 100GB with 500 accounts - something that simply doesn't occur here at SolidShellSecurity.

[ The Support ]
24/7/365 Premium Support via Live Chat, Email and Ticket System
Automatic daily, weekly, monthly Off-Site Data Backups
24/7/365 Server Monitoring
We understand that when something does not go right you need help. That is why we put a major emphasis on quality support and quick replies so you are never left hanging not knowing what to do.
